blog.name: cawerkuu
blog.title: there's not much to do in the world of misery
blog.description: I like animals, my friends, and jaded characters. You'll see that I have a dear love for Onodera Ritsu and Logan Sanders. Thank you for your time, ladies and gents.

body:
Commissions

Hi there! I decided to try something new that I’ve never done before or never thought I could do before - commissions! I am no visual artist, however, some might say I’m a literacy artist. Okay, no, that’s kind of what I am expect without the making my own stuff and just writing about my fellow gays. Sometimes even straights! (That sounded so bad!

I’ve always been sort of scared to do this because fan artists are often portrayed as these people who have great artistic skill (which they do!) and when commissions are involved, they are the only ones about to do it. Nothing against fan artists, I adore you and your work! I just find it frustrating how far writers tend to lack your ability to make money off of it but I’m getting off track!

So yes, I will be doing commissions.

I can and will write for the following:

  • Sekaiichi Hatsukoi
  • Junjou Romantica
  • Inuyasha
  • Bleach
  • My Hero Academia
  • The Phandom (AKA Daniel Howell x Philip Lester)
  • Fruits Basket
  • Sander Sides (the characters, not the real people like Thomas with Joan, Talyn, Terrence, etc)
  • Shyland (AKA Shane Dawson and Ryland Adams, love them!)
  • And probably more that I’m forgetting. Send an ask or DM and I’ll see!

Restrictions I have:

  • I can’t write eating disorders. I am okay with physical and mental illness, however, this hits home with me.
  • I will not write suicide, again, because it hits home for me

I hope you don’t find my restrictions off-putting. Everything else is up for grabs and if it isn’t or I think something might be triggering to me, I’ll let you know.

Payment:

This is /weird/, I know, but I’ll give you my address and you may send your price to my address. I trust no one is childish enough to send anything bad to my place. I have a little faith. While awaiting for it to arrive, I will work on your piece. Soon as my payment arrives at my doorstep, I will try to publish it as soon as possible for you. The longest I’ll make you wait is a week after making our agreement. I promise.

I have a set price for every fic, no matter how long or short. I tend to try and make a piece the best I can and I spend many

What I need to know from you:

  • The Anime
  • The couple, not just their ship name because sometimes I don’t even know (I’m a dork)
  • If you have a desired word length
  • The prompt of course
  • Any additional information you want me to know

Well, that’s all for now! I hope you guys do take interest in wanting to commission something. It would really help me out. Thanks for your consideration!

blog.name: isminetadeadyet
blog.title: Is Mineta Dead Yet?
blog.description: Has the godforsaken grape been smashed yet? Find out here as we count down the days until we celebrate with the finest of wine for the sweetest of victories.

summary: I just went on Instagram and somebody commented “damn you all pretend you didn’t act like Mineta when you hit puberty” and this...
question: I just went on Instagram and somebody commented “damn you all pretend you didn’t act like Mineta when you hit puberty” and this one person was like “he fucking groped Tsuyu? He tried to climb over a sauna wall to see his naked classmates? That’s sexual harassment?” And the other person said “yeah that’s normal he’s 15 lol” and I wanted to throw up like fucking. Who raised them. Why.
answer:
and the fact mineta gets no punishment means guys like this dude thinks he’s also able to get away with it.

also my thoughts are with those that had to deal with this guy growing up.

reblog.comment:
and the fact mineta gets no punishment means guys like this dude thinks he’s also able to get away with it.

Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: How did this happen?
description:
by Charles70

Well, basically class 1-a gets attacked by villains .The villains needed to retreat because something happend. Before they left they injured Izuku. There is no one they can call for help since there is no signal. Iida runs back to UA, meanhile the class try to help Izuku.

This is a very shitty summary. I am so sorry

summary: Are you into My Hero Academia?   <><
question: Are you into My Hero Academia?   <><
answer: I’ve never actually read the manga or watched the anime, but it looks good! I see a lot of content on my dash from various mutuals. I’ll probably get to it eventually—just wish there were more hours in the day for fandom activities! 😭
